Commands.Drain: Raises BRV based on Max BRV before inflicting an HP Attack.  Recovers all party members' HP based on HP damage dealt up to 10% of their Max HP.
Commands.Wall: Grants Wall and Initial BRV Up to the target for 3 turns.  All BRV damage negated by Wall is transfered to Selphie's BRV.  Wall reduces BRV damage taken and raises Debuff Evasion Rate.
Commands.Ability Recovery: Recovers 1 use of 「Drain」 and 「Wall」 (up to the initial values)  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Aura: Grants all party members 「Aura」 for 3 turns  Raises all party members' BRV based on Max BRV  No Action Delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count   「Aura」 grants BRV regen and raises EX recast speed

Passives.Drain Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Drain.
Passives.BRV Danger Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Wall BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Wall.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Drain Charge: Increases the max uses of Drain by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Wall Charge: Increases the max uses of Wall by 1.
Passives.Trabia's Mood Maker: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV of all party members when HP is over 50%.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Drain Extend: Increases Drain's max uses by 1.Slightly raises the BRV Gain based on Max BRV.Slightly raises HP recovered based on HP damage dealt.Slightly raises the HP recovery limit.Grants BRV Regen for 5 turns.
Passives.Last Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Wall Extend: Slightly improves the effects of Wall.Moderately raises the potency of Initial BRV Up.Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 6 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns after using Wall.
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises party's Initial BRV and Max BRV by 10%
Passives.Ability Recovery Extend: When using  Ability Recovery , adds or improves the following effects:- Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV- Slightly restores party's HP

Weapons.Morning Star CP: 35: Grants Wall and Initial BRV Up to all party members.Improves their effects and extends their duration.Raises all party members' BRV based on Selphie's Max BRV.
Weapons.Crescent Wish CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Aura
Weapons.Flail CP: 15: Increases Drain's BRV Gain based on Max BRV.Lowers Action Delay.Raises the HP Recovery limit.Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds the target's Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: When using  Ability Recovery , adds or improves the following effects:- Raises all party members' BRV based on Max BRV- Slightly restores all party members' HP
